game.name: Bumpers & Broadswords Tournament
game.desc:
BUMPERS & BROADSWORDS: TOURNAMENT is a Yu-Gi-Oh!-style tournament-based RPG - explore the open-world-ish city, collect roughly 60 different types of Warriors/Magicians/Beasts/Machines/Etc... to slam against each other and win the Championship!
Each Bumper has its own special effect, so choosing 4 that have a powerful synergy is vital. Ascend BUMPERCORP's TRIAL TOWER, crushing your foes to win their BUMPERS, and win the TOURNAMENT to discover what waits for you at the very top...
